Software packages for R that I've authored or contributed to:

- [DeclareDesign](https://declaredesign.org)
- [randomizr](https://declaredesign.org/r/randomizr/)
- [estimatr](https://declaredesign.org/r/estimatr/)
- [fabricatr](https://declaredesign.org/r/fabricatr/)
- [list](https://list.sensitivequestions.org)
- [ri2](http://alexandercoppock.com/ri2/)

Here are some handy cheatsheets:

- [cheatsheet for DeclareDesign](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/declaredesign.pdf)
- [cheatsheet for randomizr](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/randomizr.pdf)
- [cheatsheet for estimatr](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/estimatr.pdf)
